app_description.message: A simple addon that blocks unwanted embedded streams on websites, such as Twitch, Minnt, Kick, and Rumble. Prevents these streams from auto-playing when you browse different websites.

popup_description.message: This extension blocks unwanted embedded streams on websites.

popup_script_on.message: Stream blocker is currently removing iframes and actively blocking unwanted embedded streams.

popup_script_off.message: Stream blocker is currently disabled for this website.

options_description.message: Manage the list of domains you want to block. You can add or remove domains as needed. Please refresh the page for the changes to take effect.

options_blocked_domains_placeholder.message: Enter each domain on a new line...

options_reset_description.message: Clicking the "Reset Domains" button will restore the default blocked domains and remove any custom domains you have added.
